name: PAT_PER_CARR_ADDR
description: The PAT_PER_CARR_ADDR table contains patient information as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each line of patient info as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the carrier information.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_CITY
columns.description: The city of the patient address as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code of the patient address as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_HM_PHONE
columns.description: The home phone number of the patient as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_WK_PHONE
columns.description: The work phone number of the patient as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_PAT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_BDATE
columns.description: The birth date of the patient as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the sex of the patient as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the carrier for the patient.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the county in which the patient lives as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_GENDER_IDENTITY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores carrier specific gender identity.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the address house number as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores unique identifier of the address district as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores unique identifier of the address country as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_NAME_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The name record of the patient as specified by the carrier. This column is frequently used to link to the NAMES table.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_MBI
columns.description: The Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) of the patient, as specified by the carrier.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_ETHNIC_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: The external source ethnic group category ID for the patient.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_SEX_ASGN_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores sex assigned at birth as specified by an external source.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_SOURCE_NAME
columns.description: The source of the patient information as specified by an external source.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_PRONOUN
columns.description: The member pronoun information as specified by an external source.

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: Preferred language as specified by an external source

columns.name: CARR_ADDR_NEEDS_INTERPRETER_YN
columns.description: Whether the patient needs an interpreter as specified by an external source.
